title: Distracted Boyfriend
description: A meme featuring a man looking at another woman while his girlfriend looks on in disapproval.
author: Unknown

title: Mocking Spongebob
description: A meme featuring Spongebob Squarepants imitating a mocking pose.
author: Nickelodeon

title: Expanding Brain
description: A meme series depicting a brain expanding in consciousness with each progressive image.
author: Unknown

title: Surprised Pikachu
description: A meme showing Pikachu with a surprised expression, often used to express shock at an obvious outcome.
author: The Pokemon Company

title: Two Buttons
description: A meme featuring a man sweating as he has to choose between two pressing options.
author: Unknown

title: Woman Yelling at a Cat
description: A meme combining an image of a woman yelling and a cat sitting at a dinner table.
author: Unknown

title: Change My Mind
description: A meme featuring a man sitting at a table with a sign that reads 'Change My Mind'.
author: Steven Crowder

title: Is This a Pigeon?
description: A meme featuring a character from an anime mistaking a butterfly for a pigeon.
author: Yu Yu Hakusho

title: Philosoraptor
description: A meme featuring a dinosaur contemplating deep philosophical questions.
author: Sam Smith
